name: Tamagojamy
description:
Tamagojamy is a fast paced action tamagotchi made during the 46th Ludum Dare Game Jam. Keep it alive! Become an adult! Earn Money! Beware its needs!

Use the buttons on screen with your mouse or press the respected keys on your keyboard to change to other rooms and tackle mundane tasks like cooking or showering in a bathtub.
